Package pakkaaminen

Class HuffmanTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • pakkaaminen.HuffmanTree
  • public class HuffmanTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Binary tree to be used with Huffman coding

        public static void serializeNode​(HuffmanTree node,
